word:
I am now on my way to visit Henry, and present to him his little brother. I hope you will be good children. Love God. Speak the truth at all times. Be obedient to your parents, and then God will be pleased with you, smile upon and bless you. Be good, be good. In haste and love.--Letter 


                                    -175- 

2, 1859, p. 1. (To "Dear Children, Gilbert and Deborah" [Collins], circa 1849-50.)
